name: HoppityShot
description:
Trigger warning: if you suffer from epilepsy, motion sickness or are
otherwise susceptible to flashing lights, noises and fast camera
movements, play at your own discretion.

Left mouse button to shoot. R to reload. You have 100 health points. Can you survive the onslaught of enemies?

The game was made in a few hours for the Remake Jam. I do not have access to the original game or its source :(
